notes: Rorippae lslandicae Herba Zhao Sheng Han Cai 沼生蔊菜, the dried whole herb of Rorippa Islandica, is used to clear away Heat and promote diuresis, to counteract toxicity and relieve swelling; and is used for the treatment of edema, jaundice, gonorrhea, hydroperitoneum, sore throat, carbuncles, burns and scalds.
